meaningMnemonic: What do you use to <kanji>pull out</kanji> a <kanji>cork</kanji>? A <vocabulary>bottle opener</vocabulary>! Or a <vocabulary>corkscrew</vocabulary> if you're feeling adventurous.
readingMnemonic: This word consists of the on'yomi reading for 栓 and the kun'yomi reading for 抜, which you learned with 抜く. If you can remember that, you'll be able to remember this too!
